content: They're back!
Oh, yeah!

Woo-hoo!
KEVIN: Jim and Pam!

How was Puerto Rico? Was

It really was.
Really was.
I'm so happy for you.
Puerto Rico was awesome.

Oh, my gosh. The
honeymoon was great.

We met this other couple at
the resort, Frank and Benny.
We hung out with them a lot.

(IN HUSKY TONE) Frank and
Beans. Always makes her laugh.

(IN HUSKY TONE)
Frank and Beans.

Is there someone there?
Who's there?

I hear voices.
Is somebody there?
Yeah!

Is someone here? I can't

DWIGHT: It's Jim
and Pam, Michael.

MICHAEL: (GASPS) It is?
DWIGHT: Yeah.
They're back?
(EXCLAIMING)

Pam.
Nope.
And, oh, Jim.
Hi, Michael.

I fell into the pool

Blind guy.

Blind Guy McSqueezy.
How do I describe it?

whose lack of vision gets

The women in my improv

(EXCLAIMING)
So, what'd you bring us?
Some candy.
What else?

Oh, because you spent

(GROANING)

This conversation has

Did we have a

Number one, do not leave

It's not some kind of personal

I don't care how high

Which brings me
to item number two.

Wow. That's really thoughtful

You're welcome.

I inserted a listening device

I'm sorry to have been

It's a real handsome duck.
Mallard.
Okay, I'll get out of your hair.
Hey.

We brought back some

Coco-Leche. That's

I'll leave it up here

Oh, let me just check

I think it'll be okay.

Great.
Oops. Sorry. Oops!
I have recently taken a lover.

Well, that's great.
Congratulations.
Who's the lucky lady?
Pam's mom.

What?
Pam's mom, Helene.
Remember, from your wedding?

You're messing with me.

You did not have

Oh, big time.

She drives a green

all the way down.
All the way down.
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.

Good. A pact. A pact.

when Helene and I
tell Pam over dinner.

Oh, my God.

Hey, Jim... Not

Okay, as far as dinner

No. Not more

Okay. I...

She's right on my way

Then take a different

All right,

The last thing in the world I

Okay. So, we're good.
Yeah.

Sure.

(IN HUSKY TONE)

You know what?

(SIGHS)

PAM: Of course.

Oh.

A coworker.

Who is it?
Who is it?
Who is it, Michael?
Who?
It's okay.
No, no, no, no, no.

No. Oh, my God!
Oh, my God!

That could have

(SIGHS)

Okay.

The blood is gushing down
The blood is gushing down

(SING-SONG)

This aria is a joke.
Really?
What are you thinking?

I was going to go with this one.

Nard-Dog, what was

I know, right?

What were you guys

Trust me, it would

Due to a certain
recent incident,

corporate has asked all the
branches to come up with ideas

as to how we can better
communicate with our communities.

Is this because of the 60 Minutes

That was a hit job.

If you read the Dunder Mifflin

with that particular

So, if there is a lesson

And whoever comes up with the

Yeah.
MICHAEL: Good, good.

Okay, who wants to help

All right, good.
Volunteerism is important.

Every weekend I volunteer

Last Sunday, I had to put

All right, that's...

Paint a mural of

I have a way to make Scranton

Okay, I'm out of here.

Bye-bye.

Okay. Oh, no, here's

I love it, conservation.

Let's start by

No more meetings!
No more meetings!

No more meetings!
No more meetings!

Who else has an idea?

Angela.

Why are you crying?

If you could just

Well, for our profit and

I'm sensual.

(SIGHS) Good luck, Michael. I

Maybe you're right.
Who are we to...

No, no, no,

(LAUGHS) Oh, my God!

You are never going to

Hey.

My mother's in a wheelchair.

Yeah, sure.
